pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Nine original scripts for the series in various drafts. The scripts belonged to the real-life criminologist Dr. Carleton Simon who was a character in the episodes and who sometimes also played the part in the actual broadcast. Also includes a letter from the show's producer requesting Simon's permission to use his name.
